scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run parsing" "npm run matching"
scripts.matching: cd matching_service && conda run --no-capture-output -n assemble-matching python app.py
scripts.venv:parsing: cd parsing_service && python3 -m venv .venv && .venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && .venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.venv:matching: conda env remove -n assemble-matching -y || true && conda create -n assemble-matching python=3.13 pytorch=2.6.0 -y && conda run -n assemble-matching pip install -r matching_service/requirements.txt
scripts.bootstrap:all: cd client && npm install && cd .. && npm run venv:parsing && npm run venv:matching
